mapper.select: SELECT ACC.room_no, ACC.room_name, ACC.room_view, ACC.room_size, ACC.room_type, ACC.room_detail, ACC.amenities_common, ACC.amenities_bath, ACC.amenities_etc, ACC.room_price, IMG.img_url FROM accommodation AS ACC LEFT JOIN accommodation_img AS IMG ON ACC.room_no = IMG.room_no GROUP BY room_no
